ocean.name: Coasta Azul
ocean.desc: Right on the edge of paradise. It serves as a hotspot for the world's most common fish

nightOcean.name: Night Patch
nightOcean.desc: a strange part of the ocean where the sun never shines

redSea.name: Red Sea
redSea.desc: A sea which has large deposits of sediment, resulting in it's red color

deepOcean.name: Deep End
deepOcean.desc: a place surrounded by gargantuan oil rigs. it is possible to catch deep-sea fish from the surface with a long enough fishing line.

junkPatch.name: Junk Patch
junkPatch.desc: once a beautiful coral reef, now a huge floating island of trash. fish may not even exist here...

dreadSea.name: Dread Sea
dreadSea.desc: the tar-black waters mask the horrors within

iceOcean.name: Northern Ice Cap
iceOcean.desc: the dreary, icy part of the world.
